remarks: Calculate the difference between successive values of the Bernoulli polynomials.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-May-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2014.)
statement: bpolydif $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ X e. CC ) -> ( ( N BernPoly ( X + 1 ) ) - ( N BernPoly X ) ) = ( N x. ( X ^ ( N - 1 ) ) ) ) $.
